title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding.

Description: When the key is left blank in the properties file, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart's title.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank while it has a valid value.
3. Save the properties file.
4. Try to display the externalized text in the chart title.

Expected behavior: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.

Observed behavior: The externalized text cannot be displayed.
